name: Gallery Owner
bio: Mr. James Smith, founder of East Meets West Gallery, is a seasoned art historian and curator with a lifelong dedication to Asian and Western artistic traditions. Educated in art history and philosophy, he has worked with collectors and institutions worldwide, earning a reputation for integrity, expertise, and a discerning eye. His vision for the gallery is simple: to create a space where heritage meets innovation, and where every visitor can experience the dialogue between past and present.
quote: “A curator devoted to bridging East and West through art and vision.”
